bibl.title: Greek Inscriptions in Polish Collections. A Checklist.
bibl.note: Nos 45-113 originate from Egypt. Most of them were bought by the Lyceum Hosianum at Braunsberg (now Braniewo) through the offices of Otto Rubensohn. - Pp. 163-164: Appendix: Inscriptions that once were kept in Braunsberg and now are not in the National Museum Warsaw; - 164-171: Concordances; - 171-172: Museographic index.
LAJTAR Adam, Greek Inscriptions in Polish Collections. A Checklist.
